entry.title: Thursday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow mixed with rain ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
